doc.field: Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records

This series contains materials from subsidiary organizations and activities of the Vasa Order of America, circa 1933 to 1980. These include financial records, correspondence and receipts from the United Vasa Building Association, 1947 to 1980; financial records and correspondence pertaining to the Swedish Home for Aged People in Staten Island, 1944 to 1964; bylaws, records, correspondence, and a blank membership card for the New York District Lodge #4 Blood Fund, 1956 to 1974; an undated address book of subscribers to the Vasa Star; a few documents related to the Vasa children's clubs (barnklubben), circa 1933 to 1966; a blank advertising order form for the Vasa Radio Hour, circa 1932; and miscellaneous correspondence related to annual Sweden Day celebrations, 1958 to 1969.
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
